name: Vatnik Simulator - A Russian Patriot Game
description: Become a vatnik! In this game you can drink for Tsar and for Russia, pray to the Putin and enjoy life in a Russia! Do you respect Tsar Vladimir?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
